description._content: Edit the bounding box of an existing person on a photo.

error._content: The NSID passed was not a valid user id.
The photo id passed was not a valid photo id.

error.message: User cannot edit that person in that photo
error._content: The calling user did not originally add this person to the photo, and is not the person in question.
Not all of the co-ordinate parameters (person_x, person_y, person_w, person_h) were passed with valid values.
None of the co-ordinate parameters were valid.
SSL is required to access the Flickr API.
The call required signing but no signature was sent.
The login details or auth token passed were invalid.

error.message: User not logged in / Insufficient permissions
error._content: The method requires user authentication but the user was not logged in, or the authenticated method call did not have the required permissions.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: photo_id
argument._content: The id of the photo to edit a person in.

argument.name: user_id
argument._content: The NSID of the person to edit in a photo.

argument.name: person_x
argument._content: The left-most pixel co-ordinate of the box around the person.

argument.name: person_y
argument._content: The top-most pixel co-ordinate of the box around the person.

argument.name: person_w
argument._content: The width (in pixels) of the box around the person.

argument.name: person_h
argument._content: The height (in pixels) of the box around the person.
